Package model

Class MinderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MinderManager
  • public class MinderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the Server's model. It doesn't store data it mostly redirects the petitions to the Database.

      • evolucionMatchesDia

        public void evolucionMatchesDia​(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> fechas,
                                java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> cantidades,
                                java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> tiempo)
        Query to get the data from the last 24h matches to make the plot of it
        Parameters:
        fechas - LinkedList of String of the original data (the exact dates of every match)
        cantidades - LinkedList of Integers of the quantity of matches per unit of time
        tiempo - LinkedList of String of the units of time. In this case the unit is hours.

      • evolucionMatchesSemana

        public void evolucionMatchesSemana​(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> fechas,
                                   java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> cantidades,
                                   java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> tiempo)
        Query to get the data from the last 7 days' matches to make the plot of it
        Parameters:
        fechas - LinkedList of String of the original data (the exact dates of every match)
        cantidades - LinkedList of Integers of the quantity of matches per unit of time
        tiempo - LinkedList of String of the units of time. In this case the unit is days.

      • evolucionMatchesMes

        public void evolucionMatchesMes​(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> fechas,
                                java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> cantidades,
                                java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> tiempo)
        Query to get the data from the last month's matches to make the plot of it
        Parameters:
        fechas - LinkedList of String of the original data (the exact dates of every match)
        cantidades - LinkedList of Integers of the quantity of matches per unit of time
        tiempo - LinkedList of String of the units of time. In this case the unit is days.
